Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 19 Aug 2019SGX reits definitely. No taxes imposed means higher yield. Overseas reits have withholding taxes which reduces the yield.3 comments0

Sandra TeoLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 22 Mar 2019Majority of overseas REITs have a higher yield as compared to Singapore REITs. However, it is easier to invest in SG Reits as there is lower interest rates, reduced political risk and is easier to justify the quality of the sponsors.0 comments0
